Html:
Hi.

 

I'm trying to draw a image on a gmapcontrol using gdi, a png image with alpha.

This is an example:

http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/Uc7Ksq6FWCCj6mX48n86Sw?feat=directlink

 

When the map control is resized the pirate should be resized proportionally, always docked to the left of the map, this part is easy. However, the paint event doesn't work. So i don't know a way to draw the image.

Do you know any solution?

 

Thank you very much.
all painting you can do by overriding void OnPaintEtc

Wooowww. You are a master. It works perfectly.

 

Thank thank you very much. xxxx
